item.title: WAI-ARIA
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Since modern websites and applications contain huge amounts of dynamic content and complex components with no semantics to describe what they mean, users with disabilities, those dependent on assistive technologies such as Screen Reader, text-to-speech or screen magnification tools might suffer to interact with those components.
